page.title: 09SCHOOLS IN GRANTOWN
page.content:
Grantown -on-Spey has two schools, Grantown Primary and Grantown Grammar School. The Primary school is housed in the old building which used to be the Grammar School and Primary Department. In the 1960s a new Grammar school was built.
The Grammar school has about 350 pupils, between the ages of twelve and eighteen. It has about 35 teachers, plus non-teaching staff. It offers courses to university entrance level.
It also has a wide range of other facilities. This includes a swimming pool, gymnasium and sports field. The hall also has a stage which is used for plays and concerts.
The school is also used for a wide range of night classes
